name: Caselist
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com https://*.austlii.edu.au/* https://*.canlii.org/* https://*.lawphil.net/* https://ssl.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com http://*.worldlii.org/* https://*.austlii.edu.au/* http://*.bailii.org/* https://*.canlii.org/* http://*.hklii.hk/* https://*.lawphil.net/* http://*.nzlii.org/* https://ssl.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com https://*.austlii.edu.au/* https://*.canlii.org/* https://*.lawphil.net/* https://ssl.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: gap: https://*.auth0.com http://*.worldlii.org/* https://*.austlii.edu.au/* http://*.bailii.org/* https://*.canlii.org/* http://*.hklii.hk/* https://*.lawphil.net/* http://*.nzlii.org/* https://ssl.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' data: gap: https://*.auth0.com http://*.worldlii.org/* https://*.austlii.edu.au/* http://*.bailii.org/* https://*.canlii.org/* http://*.hklii.hk/* https://*.lawphil.net/* http://*.nzlii.org/* https://*.lawnet.sg/* http://*.lawnet.sg/* https://ssl.gstatic.com
